details.description:
Discover the allure of this delightful 2-bedroom apartment nestled in the heart of vibrant Clinton Hill.
Step into modernity with an updated kitchen and bathroom, boasting contemporary fixtures and appliances that elevate daily living to new heights.
Entertain guests or unwind in the welcoming embrace of the spacious living room, offering ample space for relaxation and social gatherings alike.
With two bedrooms, find versatility to tailor your living space to your needs?a master bedroom providing generous space and a second bedroom perfect for a home office or guest room.
Convenience meets comfort with shared laundry facilities and access to a tranquil backyard oasis, providing opportunities for both practicality and relaxation.
Situated in a prime location, enjoy easy access to a myriad of amenities, including local shops, restaurants, and parks. Commuting is a breeze with nearby transportation options, such as the Brooklyn Navy Yard ferry and Citi Bikes, allowing you to explore the neighborhood with ease.
Don't miss out on the opportunity to call this charming apartment your home. Schedule a viewing today and experience the unparalleled charm and convenience of Clinton Hill living.

Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk; Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Small pets welcome No broker fee Available April 1st

details.description:
Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen, separate living room with natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, and renovated bathroom.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first; security Heat; hot water included NO BROKER FEE

Incredible Williamsburg location.

Quickly walk to a HUGE grocer (such a luxury in Brooklyn), bars and restaurants galore, and the easiest transportation ever! This fully renovated 2 BR is classic Brooklyn with exposed brick and oak hardwood floors, Sun splashed with lots of windows and a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Bedrooms are bright with closet space. Crown Heights is a lively diverse neighborhood with easy access to unlimited choices for food, entertainment and cultural events. It's a short enjoyable walk to the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and the Botanic Gardens. Great local restaurants and bars like Chavela's, Dutch Boy, Cent'Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady's surround you. It's easy to access most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal for an easy commute to Manhattan; the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Contact us to schedule your appointment today!

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. Not only will you have the chance for somewhat of a city escape, but you will still have everything you need around you with full size grocers, pharmacies, bodegas, liquor stores, retail shops, tattoo shops, whatever your heart desires! You won?t be miss out on any luxuries inside your new home at The Ballgreen Complex either! Fully equipped with all a renter could need in NYC. Come on by and take a look with us!

This Ridgewood neighborhood backs right up to Bushwick, serving as it's older and wiser sibling :) You can enjoy all of the same delicious cuisine, fair trade hot (and necessary) coffee, unique locally owned businesses, bodegas and grocers, and centralized transportation as it's neighboring Brooklyn areas, all while keeping that lovely community feel of a slightly more residential and peaceful existence. *Long exhale* now that's the right choice.
